name: Monkey D. Luffy
text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] [DON!! -2]: If you only have {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters in play, set up to 2 of your rested Don!! cards as active. Then, this leader gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: If you only have {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters in play, set up to 2 of your rested Don!! cards as active. Then, this leader gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
